DOC.brief_summary: The Lateral Tibial Tunnel technique new concept Anterior Cruciate Ligament ( ACL ) surgery . In technique tibial tunnel drill antero-lateral side tibia towards ACL footprint . This technique allow surgeon deal bone stock problem antero-medial part tibia often encounter ACL revision surgery . In ACL revision surgery often impossible perform one-stage revision surgery procedure due bone stock deficiency antero-medial side tibia . It hypothesize Lateral tibial tunnel technique allow surgeon perform one-stage procedure instead two stage procedure . Furthermore lateral tibial tunnel technique allow well graft fixation two-stage ACL revision surgery . Several biomechanical study prove biomechanical superiority new technique compare classical technique .
